languages.text: "Столь же кровавый, сколь и разочаровывающий финал. Руками недостойных претендентов ничтожества, ложно занявшие места чемпионов арены, были низвергнуты. На пики их, и слава победител{mf|ю|ьнице}".

"A finale as bloody as it is disappointing. The pathetic amateurs who were wrongfully proclaimed champions of the arena have been brought down at the hands of unworthy challengers. Impale the failures, and glory to the victor."
languages.original_text: "Столь же кровавый, сколь и разочаровывающий финал. Руками недостойных претендентов ничтожества, ложно занявшие места чемпионов арены, были низвергнуты. На пики их, и слава победител{mf|ю|ьнице}".

traits.locale_text: "A finale as bloody as it is disappointing. The pathetic amateurs who had been wrongfully proclaimed champions of the arena were brought down by the hands of unworthy challengers. Impale the failures, and glory to the victor."

"A finale as bloody as it is disappointing. The pathetic amateurs who had been wrongfully proclaimed champions of the arena were brought down by the hands of unworthy challengers. Impale the failures, and glory to the victor."

"A finale as bloody as it is disappointing. The pathetic amateurs who had been wrongfully proclaimed champions of the arena were brought down at the hands of unworthy challengers. Impale the failures, and glory to the victor."

"A finale as bloody as it is disappointing. The pathetic amateurs who had been wrongfully proclaimed champions of the arena were brought down at the hands of unworthy challengers. Impale the failures, and glory to the victor."

"A finale as bloody as it is disappointing. The pathetic amateurs who were wrongfully proclaimed champions of the arena have been brought down at the hands of unworthy challengers. Impale the failures, and glory to the victor."

"A finale as bloody as it is disappointing. The pathetic amateurs who were wrongfully proclaimed champions of the arena have been brought down at the hands of unworthy challengers. Impale the failures, and glory to the victor."

languages.text: « Un final aussi sanglant que décevant... Les amateurs pathétiques qui ont été désignés comme champions de l'arène sur un malentendu ont été massacrés par des concurrents indignes. Gloire aux vainqueurs, et qu'on empale les perdants ! »
languages.original_text: "A finale as bloody as it is disappointing. The pathetic amateurs who were wrongfully proclaimed champions of the arena have been brought down at the hands of unworthy challengers. Impale the failures, and glory to the victor."

traits.locale_text: « Un final aussi sanglant que décevant... Les amateurs pathétiques qui ont été désignés comme champions de l'arène sur un malentendu ont été massacrés par des concurrents indignes. Gloire aux vainqueurs, et qu'on empale les perdants. »

languages.text: “这样的结局既血腥，又令人失望。那群没用的废物自称是竞技场的冠军，结果却死在了不值一提的挑战者的手上。来人，把那些失败者的尸体串在铁桩上，荣耀归于胜利者。”
languages.original_text: "A finale as bloody as it is disappointing. The pathetic amateurs who were wrongfully proclaimed champions of the arena have been brought down at the hands of unworthy challengers. Impale the failures, and glory to the victor."

traits.locale_text: “这样的结局既血腥，又令人失望。那群没用的废物自称是竞技场的冠军，结果却倒在了不值一提的挑战者的手上。来人，把那些失败者的尸体串在铁桩上，荣耀归于胜利者。”

languages.text: 「ガッカリするほど血なまぐさいフィナーレだ。アリーナの王者として不当に祭り上げられた未熟者たちが、分不相応な挑戦者の手によって倒された。負け犬にとどめを刺し、勝利者に栄光を」
languages.original_text: "A finale as bloody as it is disappointing. The pathetic amateurs who were wrongfully proclaimed champions of the arena have been brought down at the hands of unworthy challengers. Impale the failures, and glory to the victor."

traits.locale_text: 「ガッカリするほど血なまぐさいフィナーレだ。アリーナの王者として不当に祭り上げられた未熟者たちが、分不相応な挑戦者の手によって倒された。負け犬にとどめを刺し、勝利者に栄光を」

languages.text: "Ein blutiges, aber irgendwie enttäuschendes Ende. Lächerliche Amateure, die völlig zu Unrecht Champions der Arena waren, wurden von unwürdigen Herausforderern gestürzt. Spießt diese Versager auf, der Ruhm gebührt nur den Siegern."
languages.original_text: "A finale as bloody as it is disappointing. The pathetic amateurs who were wrongfully proclaimed champions of the arena have been brought down at the hands of unworthy challengers. Impale the failures, and glory to the victor."

traits.locale_text: "Ein blutiges, aber irgendwie enttäuschendes Ende. Lächerliche Amateure, die völlig zu Unrecht Champions der Arena waren, wurden von unwürdigen Herausforderern gestürzt. Spießt diese Versager auf, der Ruhm gebührt nur den Siegern."

languages.text: «Una gran final tan sangrienta como decepcionante. Los patéticos aficionados que habían sido proclamados campeones de la arena sin merecerlo han caído frente a aspirantes indignos. Alabad a los vencedores y empalad a los vencidos».
languages.original_text: "A finale as bloody as it is disappointing. The pathetic amateurs who were wrongfully proclaimed champions of the arena have been brought down at the hands of unworthy challengers. Impale the failures, and glory to the victor."

traits.locale_text: «Una gran final tan sangrienta como decepcionante. Los patéticos aficionados que fueron proclamados campeones de la arena sin merecerlo han caído frente a aspirantes indignos. Alabad a los vencedores y empalad a los vencidos».

languages.text: "Bu final beni hayal kırıklığına uğrattı. Arenanın müdafileri olarak addedilen bu acınası çaylaklar, naçiz rakiplerin elinde yitip gitti. Çapsızları kazığa geçirin, galip çok yaşa!"
languages.original_text: "A finale as bloody as it is disappointing. The pathetic amateurs who were wrongfully proclaimed champions of the arena have been brought down at the hands of unworthy challengers. Impale the failures, and glory to the victor."

traits.locale_text: "Bu final beni hayal kırıklığına uğrattı. Arenanın müdafileri olarak addedilen bu acınası çaylaklar, naçiz rakiplerin elinde yitip gitti. Çapsızları kazığa geçirin, galip çok yaşa!"
